wog.name: Workshop on Genomics
wog.description: Annual workshop focusing on genomic data analysis techniques including genome assembly, annotation, alignment, and variant calling.

wpsg.name: Workshop on Population and Speciation Genomics
wpsg.description: Biennial workshop analyzing genomic data at population and species levels.

wphylo.name: Workshop on Phylogenomics
wphylo.description: Workshop exploring large-scale phylogenetics and phylogenomics.

wmolevo.name: Workshop on Molecular Evolution
wmolevo.description: Historical workshop focusing on molecular phylogenetics and population genetics.
wmolevo.location: Český Krumlov, Czech Republic & Fort Collins, USA

htranscriptomics.name: Harvard Workshop on Transcriptomics
htranscriptomics.description: Harvard University workshop on computational transcriptomics and RNA-seq analysis.

hmicrobial.name: Harvard Workshop on Microbial Genomics
hmicrobial.description: Harvard University workshop on bacterial and viral genomics.
